languages.text: {n}Призраки не исчезли окончательно после той битвы, но стали появляться реже и избегали поселений людей.{/n}
{n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Призраки не исчезли окончательно после той битвы, но стали появляться реже и избегали поселений людей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after that battle, but have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

{n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

languages.text: {n}战斗结束之后，幽灵并没有彻底消失，但它们出现的频率开始减少，而且会刻意避开人类的社区。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}战斗结束之后，幽灵并没有彻底消失，但它们出现的频率开始减少，而且会刻意避开人类的社区。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los espectros no desaparecieron por completo tras la batalla, pero se manifiestan con menos frecuencia y evitan los asentamientos humanos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los espectros no desaparecieron por completo tras la batalla, pero se manifiestan con menos frecuencia y evitan los asentamientos humanos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}戦闘後、レイスは完全に姿を消したわけではないが、出現頻度が減り、人間の居住区域を避けるようになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}戦闘後、レイスは完全に姿を消したわけではないが、出現頻度が減り、人間の居住区域を避けるようになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}S'ils ne disparaissent pas complètement après la bataille, les esprits commencent à apparaître moins souvent et à éviter les agglomérations humaines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}S'ils ne disparaissent pas complètement après la bataille, les esprits commencent à apparaître moins souvent et à éviter les agglomérations humaines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Geister sind nach dem Kampf nicht vollständig verschwunden, erscheinen nun jedoch viel seltener und meiden menschliche Siedlungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Geister sind nach dem Kampf nicht vollständig verschwunden, erscheinen nun jedoch viel seltener und meiden menschliche Siedlungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tayflar, savaşın ardından tamamen yok olmasalar da daha nadir ortaya çıkmaya ve insan yerleşim yerlerinden kaçınmaya başladılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wraiths did not disappear completely after the battle, but they have started to appear less often and avoid human settlements.{/n}
